actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to amend the International Security and Development Cooperation Act of 1985 to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1992 and 1993 for the United States Commission for the Preservation of America's Heritage Abroad for carrying out that Act.
short_title: Commission for the Preservation of America's Heritage Abroad Authorization Act of 1992

summary.text: Commission for the Preservation of America's Heritage Abroad Authorization Act of 1992 - Amends the International Security and Development Act of 1985 to authorize appropriations for the Commission for the Preservation of America's Heritage Abroad.

titles.title: Commission for the Preservation of America's Heritage Abroad Authorization Act of 1992

A bill to amend the International Security and Development Cooperation Act of 1985 to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1992 and 1993 for the United States Commission for the Preservation of America's Heritage Abroad for carrying out that Act.
